title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Embrace the Mayhem of Motor Wars and Get 2X GTA$ and RP
content:
The smell of burning diesel hangs in the air. Explosions echo through the streets. Parachute into an ever-shrinking hotbed of team-based chaos, littered with heavy weaponry and armed vehicles.

Whether youâ€™re the last team standing or the first to bite the dust, Motor Wars is paying out 2X GTA$ and RP through March 27.
